001package squidpony.squidgrid.mapping;
002
003
004import squidpony.squidgrid.Direction;
005import squidpony.squidmath.Coord;
006import squidpony.squidmath.GWTRNG;
007import squidpony.squidmath.IRNG;
008import squidpony.squidmath.OrderedSet;
009
010import java.util.ArrayDeque;
011import java.util.ArrayList;
012
013/**
014 * Creates a dungeon in the style of the original Rogue game. It will always
015 * make a grid style of rooms where there are a certain number horizontally and
016 * vertically and it will link them only next to each other.
017 *
018 * This dungeon generator is based on a port of the rot.js version.
019 *
020 * @author hyakugei
021 * @author Eben Howard - http://squidpony.com - howard@squidpony.com
022 */
023public class ClassicRogueMapGenerator implements IDungeonGenerator{
024
025    /**
026     * Holds the information needed to track rooms in the classic rogue
027     * generation algorithm.
028     */
029    private static class ClassicRogueRoom {
030
031        private int x, y, width, height, cellx, celly;
032        private final OrderedSet<ClassicRogueRoom> connections = new OrderedSet<>(4);
033        ClassicRogueRoom(int x, int y, int width, int height, int cellx, int celly) {
034            this.x = x;
035            this.y = y;
036            this.width = width;
037            this.height = height;
038            this.cellx = cellx;
039            this.celly = celly;
040        }
041
042        @Override
043        public int hashCode() {
044            return Coord.xoroHashCode(cellx, celly);
045            // the actual algorithm doesn't matter much here.
046            // another good option, if you don't feel like looking up xoroHashCode(), is
047            //return (int)(0xC13FA9A902A6328FL * cellx + 0x91E10DA5C79E7B1DL * celly >>> 32);
048        }
049
050        @Override
051        public boolean equals(Object obj) {
052            if (obj == null) {
053                return false;
054            }
055            if (getClass() != obj.getClass()) {
056                return false;
057            }
058            final ClassicRogueRoom other = (ClassicRogueRoom) obj;
059            if (cellx != other.cellx) {
060                return false;
061            }
062            return celly == other.celly;
063        }
064    }
065
066    private IRNG rng;
067
068    private int horizontalRooms, verticalRooms, dungeonWidth, dungeonHeight,
069            minRoomWidth, maxRoomWidth, minRoomHeight, maxRoomHeight;
070    private ClassicRogueRoom[][] rooms;
071    private char[][] dungeon;
072    private Direction[] dirToCheck = new Direction[4];
073    /**
074     * Initializes the generator to turn out random dungeons within the specific
075     * parameters.
076     *
077     * Will size down the room width and height parameters if needed to ensure
078     * the desired number of rooms will fit both horizontally and vertically.
079     *
080     * @param horizontalRooms How many rooms will be made horizontally
081     * @param verticalRooms How many rooms will be made vertically
082     * @param dungeonWidth How wide the total dungeon will be
083     * @param dungeonHeight How high the total dungeon will be
084     * @param minRoomWidth The minimum width a room can be
085     * @param maxRoomWidth The maximum width a room can be
086     * @param minRoomHeight The minimum height a room can be
087     * @param maxRoomHeight The maximum height a room can be
088     */
089    public ClassicRogueMapGenerator(int horizontalRooms, int verticalRooms, int dungeonWidth, int dungeonHeight,
090                                    int minRoomWidth, int maxRoomWidth, int minRoomHeight, int maxRoomHeight) {
091        this(horizontalRooms, verticalRooms, dungeonWidth, dungeonHeight, minRoomWidth, maxRoomWidth, minRoomHeight, maxRoomHeight, new GWTRNG());
092    }
093
094    /**
095     * Initializes the generator to turn out random dungeons within the specific
096     * parameters.
097     *
098     * Will size down the room width and height parameters if needed to ensure
099     * the desired number of rooms will fit both horizontally and vertically.
100     *
101     * @param horizontalRooms How many rooms will be made horizontally
102     * @param verticalRooms How many rooms will be made vertically
103     * @param dungeonWidth How wide the total dungeon will be
104     * @param dungeonHeight How high the total dungeon will be
105     * @param minRoomWidth The minimum width a room can be
106     * @param maxRoomWidth The maximum width a room can be
107     * @param minRoomHeight The minimum height a room can be
108     * @param maxRoomHeight The maximum height a room can be
109     */
110    public ClassicRogueMapGenerator(int horizontalRooms, int verticalRooms, int dungeonWidth, int dungeonHeight,
111                                    int minRoomWidth, int maxRoomWidth, int minRoomHeight, int maxRoomHeight, IRNG rng)
112    {
113        this.rng = rng;
114        this.horizontalRooms = horizontalRooms;
115        this.verticalRooms = verticalRooms;
116        this.dungeonWidth = dungeonWidth;
117        this.dungeonHeight = dungeonHeight;
118        this.minRoomWidth = minRoomWidth;
119        this.maxRoomWidth = maxRoomWidth;
120        this.minRoomHeight = minRoomHeight;
121        this.maxRoomHeight = maxRoomHeight;
122
123        sanitizeRoomDimensions();
124    }
125
126    private void sanitizeRoomDimensions() {
127        int test = (dungeonWidth - 3 * horizontalRooms) / horizontalRooms;//have to leave space for hallways
128        maxRoomWidth = Math.min(test, maxRoomWidth);
129        minRoomWidth = Math.max(minRoomWidth, 2);
130        minRoomWidth = Math.min(minRoomWidth, maxRoomWidth);
131
132        test = (dungeonHeight - 3 * verticalRooms) / verticalRooms;//have to leave space for hallways
133        maxRoomHeight = Math.min(test, maxRoomHeight);
134        minRoomHeight = Math.max(minRoomHeight, 2);
135        minRoomHeight = Math.min(minRoomHeight, maxRoomHeight);
136    }
137
138    /**
139     * Builds and returns a map in the Classic Rogue style, returned as a 2D char array.
140     *
141     * Only includes rooms ('.' for floor and '#' for walls), corridors (using the same chars as rooms) and doors ('+'
142     * for closed doors, does not generate open doors).
143     * @return a 2D char array version of the map
144     */
145    public char[][] generate()
146    {
147        initRooms();
148        connectRooms();
149        connectUnconnectedRooms();
150        fullyConnect();
151        createRooms();
152        createCorridors();
153        return dungeon;
154    }
155
156    public char[][] getDungeon() {
157        return dungeon;
158    }
159
160    private void initRooms() {
161        rooms = new ClassicRogueRoom[horizontalRooms][verticalRooms];
162        dungeon = new char[dungeonWidth][dungeonHeight];
163        for (int x = 0; x < horizontalRooms; x++) {
164            for (int y = 0; y < verticalRooms; y++) {
165                rooms[x][y] = new ClassicRogueRoom(0, 0, 0, 0, x, y);
166            }
167        }
168        for (int x = 0; x < dungeonWidth; x++) {
169            for (int y = 0; y < dungeonHeight; y++) {
170                dungeon[x][y] = '#';
171            }
172        }
173    }
174
175    private void connectRooms() {
176        ArrayList<ClassicRogueRoom> unconnected = new ArrayList<>();
177        for (int x = 0; x < horizontalRooms; x++) {
178            for (int y = 0; y < verticalRooms; y++) {
179                unconnected.add(rooms[x][y]);
180            }
181        }
182        rng.shuffleInPlace(unconnected);
183
184        for (int i = 0; i < unconnected.size(); i++) {
185            ClassicRogueRoom room = unconnected.get(i);
186            rng.shuffle(Direction.CARDINALS, dirToCheck);
187            for (Direction dir : dirToCheck) {
188                int nextX = room.x + dir.deltaX;
189                int nextY = room.y + dir.deltaY;
190                if (nextX < 0 || nextX >= horizontalRooms || nextY < 0 || nextY >= verticalRooms) {
191                    continue;
192                }
193                ClassicRogueRoom otherRoom = rooms[nextX][nextY];
194
195                if (room.connections.contains(otherRoom)) {
196                    break;//already connected to this room
197                }
198
199                if (!otherRoom.connections.isEmpty()) {
200                    room.connections.add(otherRoom);
201                    break;
202                }
203            }
204        }
205    }
206
207    private void connectUnconnectedRooms() {
208        for (int x = 0; x < horizontalRooms; x++) {
209            for (int y = 0; y < verticalRooms; y++) {
210                ClassicRogueRoom room = rooms[x][y];
211
212                if (room.connections.isEmpty()) {
213                    rng.shuffle(Direction.CARDINALS, dirToCheck);
214
215                    boolean validRoom = false;
216                    ClassicRogueRoom otherRoom = null;
217                    int idx = 0;
218                    do {
219                        Direction dir = dirToCheck[idx++];
220
221                        int nextX = x + dir.deltaX;
222                        if (nextX < 0 || nextX >= horizontalRooms) {
223                            continue;
224                        }
225                        int nextY = y + dir.deltaY;
226                        if (nextY < 0 || nextY >= verticalRooms) {
227                            continue;
228                        }
229
230                        otherRoom = rooms[nextX][nextY];
231                        validRoom = true;
232
233                        if (otherRoom.connections.contains(room)) {
234                            validRoom = false;
235                        }
236                        else {
237                            break;
238                        }
239                    } while (idx < 4);
240
241                    if (validRoom) {
242                        room.connections.add(otherRoom);
243                    }
244                }
245            }
246        }
247    }
248
249    private void fullyConnect() {
250        boolean allGood;
251        do {
252            ArrayDeque<ClassicRogueRoom> deq = new ArrayDeque<>(horizontalRooms * verticalRooms);
253            for (int x = 0; x < horizontalRooms; x++) {
254                for (int y = 0; y < verticalRooms; y++) {
255                    deq.offer(rooms[x][y]);
256                }
257            }
258            ArrayList<ClassicRogueRoom> connected = new ArrayList<>();
259            connected.add(deq.removeFirst());
260            boolean changed = true;
261            TESTING:
262            while (changed) {
263                changed = false;
264                for (ClassicRogueRoom test : deq) {
265                    for (int i = 0, connectedSize = connected.size(); i < connectedSize; i++) {
266                        ClassicRogueRoom r = connected.get(i);
267                        if (test.connections.contains(r) || r.connections.contains(test)) {
268                            connected.add(test);
269                            deq.remove(test);
270                            changed = true;
271                            continue TESTING;
272                        }
273                    }
274                }
275            }
276
277            allGood = true;
278            if (!deq.isEmpty()) {
279                TESTING:
280                for (ClassicRogueRoom room : deq) {
281                    for (Direction dir : Direction.CARDINALS) {
282                        int x = room.cellx + dir.deltaX;
283                        int y = room.celly + dir.deltaY;
284                        if (x >= 0 && y >= 0 && x < horizontalRooms && y < verticalRooms) {
285                            ClassicRogueRoom otherRoom = rooms[x][y];
286                            if (connected.contains(otherRoom)) {
287                                room.connections.add(otherRoom);
288                                allGood = false;
289                                break TESTING;
290                            }
291                        }
292                    }
293                }
294            }
295
296        } while (!allGood);
297    }
298
299    private void createRooms() {
300        int cwp = dungeonWidth / horizontalRooms;
301        int chp = dungeonHeight / verticalRooms;
302
303        ClassicRogueRoom otherRoom;
304
305        for (int x = 0; x < horizontalRooms; x++) {
306            for (int y = 0; y < verticalRooms; y++) {
307                int sx = cwp * x;
308                int sy = chp * y;
309
310                sx = Math.max(sx, 2);
311                sy = Math.max(sy, 2);
312
313                int roomw = rng.between(minRoomWidth, maxRoomWidth + 1);
314                int roomh = rng.between(minRoomHeight, maxRoomHeight + 1);
315
316                if (y > 0) {
317                    otherRoom = rooms[x][y - 1];
318                    while (sy - (otherRoom.y + otherRoom.height) < 3) {
319                        sy++;
320                    }
321                }
322
323                if (x > 0) {
324                    otherRoom = rooms[x - 1][y];
325                    while (sx - (otherRoom.x + otherRoom.width) < 3) {
326                        sx++;
327                    }
328                }
329
330                int sxOffset = Math.round(rng.nextInt(cwp - roomw) * 0.5f);
331                int syOffset = Math.round(rng.nextInt(chp - roomh) * 0.5f);
332
333                while (sx + sxOffset + roomw >= dungeonWidth) {
334                    if (sxOffset > 0) {
335                        sxOffset--;
336                    } else {
337                        roomw--;
338                    }
339                }
340                while (sy + syOffset + roomh >= dungeonHeight) {
341                    if (syOffset > 0) {
342                        syOffset--;
343                    } else {
344                        roomh--;
345                    }
346                }
347
348                sx += sxOffset;
349                sy += syOffset;
350
351                ClassicRogueRoom r = rooms[x][y];
352                r.x = sx;
353                r.y = sy;
354                r.width = roomw;
355                r.height = roomh;
356
357                for (int xx = sx; xx < sx + roomw; xx++) {
358                    for (int yy = sy; yy < sy + roomh; yy++) {
359                        dungeon[xx][yy] = '.';
360                    }
361                }
362            }
363        }
364    }
365
366    private Coord randomWallPosition(ClassicRogueRoom room, Direction dir) {
367        int x, y;
368        Coord p = null;
369
370        switch (dir) {
371            case LEFT:
372                y = rng.between(room.y + 1, room.y + room.height);
373                x = room.x - 1;
374                dungeon[x][y] = '+';
375                p = Coord.get(x - 1, y);
376                break;
377            case RIGHT:
378                y = rng.between(room.y + 1, room.y + room.height);
379                x = room.x + room.width;
380                dungeon[x][y] = '+';
381                p = Coord.get(x + 1, y);
382                break;
383            case DOWN:
384                x = rng.between(room.x + 1, room.x + room.width);
385                y = room.y - 1;
386                dungeon[x][y] = '+';
387                p = Coord.get(x, y + 1);
388                break;
389            case UP:
390                x = rng.between(room.x + 1, room.x + room.width);
391                y = room.y + room.height;
392                dungeon[x][y] = '+';
393                p = Coord.get(x, y - 1);
394                break;
395        case NONE:
396                break;
397                case DOWN_LEFT:
398                case DOWN_RIGHT:
399                case UP_LEFT:
400                case UP_RIGHT:
401                        throw new IllegalStateException("There should only be cardinal positions here");
402        }
403
404        return p;
405    }
406
407    /**
408     * Draws a corridor between the two points with a zig-zag in between.
409     *
410     * @param start
411     * @param end
412     */
413    private void digPath(Coord start, Coord end) {
414        int xOffset = end.x - start.x;
415        int yOffset = end.y - start.y;
416        int xpos = start.x;
417        int ypos = start.y;
418
419        ArrayDeque<Magnitude> moves = new ArrayDeque<>();
420
421        int xAbs = Math.abs(xOffset);
422        int yAbs = Math.abs(yOffset);
423
424        double firstHalf = rng.nextDouble();
425        double secondHalf = 1 - firstHalf;
426
427        Direction xDir = xOffset < 0 ? Direction.LEFT : Direction.RIGHT;
428        Direction yDir = yOffset > 0 ? Direction.DOWN : Direction.UP;
429
430        if (xAbs < yAbs) {
431            int tempDist = (int) Math.ceil(yAbs * firstHalf);
432            moves.add(new Magnitude(yDir, tempDist));
433            moves.add(new Magnitude(xDir, xAbs));
434            tempDist = (int) Math.floor(yAbs * secondHalf);
435            moves.add(new Magnitude(yDir, tempDist));
436        } else {
437            int tempDist = (int) Math.ceil(xAbs * firstHalf);
438            moves.add(new Magnitude(xDir, tempDist));
439            moves.add(new Magnitude(yDir, yAbs));
440            tempDist = (int) Math.floor(xAbs * secondHalf);
441            moves.add(new Magnitude(xDir, tempDist));
442        }
443
444        dungeon[xpos][ypos] = '.';
445
446        while (!moves.isEmpty()) {
447            Magnitude move = moves.removeFirst();
448            Direction dir = move.dir;
449            int dist = move.distance;
450            while (dist > 0) {
451                xpos += dir.deltaX;
452                ypos += dir.deltaY;
453                dungeon[xpos][ypos] = '.';
454                dist--;
455            }
456        }
457    }
458
459    private void createCorridors() {
460        for (int x = 0; x < horizontalRooms; x++) {
461            for (int y = 0; y < verticalRooms; y++) {
462                ClassicRogueRoom room = rooms[x][y];
463                for (int r = 0; r < room.connections.size(); r++) {
464                    ClassicRogueRoom otherRoom = room.connections.getAt(r);
465                    Direction dir = Direction.getCardinalDirection(otherRoom.cellx - room.cellx, otherRoom.celly - room.celly);
466                    digPath(randomWallPosition(room, dir), randomWallPosition(otherRoom, dir.opposite()));
467                }
468            }
469        }
470    }
471
472    private static class Magnitude {
473
474        public Direction dir;
475        public int distance;
476
477        public Magnitude(Direction dir, int distance) {
478            this.dir = dir;
479            this.distance = distance;
480        }
481    }
482}
